content:
Hello,
Is there a way to invite users with different duration before the invite becomes invalid without changing the default value every time?
I tried looking in the help documents but there is nothing of this sort.

Thank you.
@Taira Jiza have you considered using a multi-use invitation link?

That is what we're using but I don't think I can specify the time before the multiuse link expires. We've have INVITATION_LINK_VALIDITY_DAYS =2 in default settings for most cases however we sometimes prefer more than 2 days for some invitations, so is there a way to change/set this value without restarting the server.
@Taira Jiza you do change it on the manage.py shell manually by sorta cheating -- change the creation date of the link to far in the future.
But we're working on adding UI for that; https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/16407 is the preparatory step.

change the creation date of the link to far in the future.

Okay. I think we can make it work with this for now, however we don't want this to be the permanent solution.
It's good to know that you have already thought about this.

Thank you, Tim Abbot.
